p: The experimental area was divided into three blocks to account for any shading effect from adjacent sides. After pruning of damask rose bushes in the month of December, nine treatments consisting of three shade net houses viz., control (without shade), 25% shade and 50% shade level were made. Three mulch types viz., control (without mulch), organic mulch at the rate of 5 t/ha (poplar leaf mulch) and black polyethylene mulch (25/30 micron size) in sub plots were organized.
